p: Comparing the anomalies between the cities, there are significant differences between London/Luxembourg (both RCPs) and Rome/Luxembourg, for the near future (2001–2030). For the middle (2031–2060) and far future (2061–2090) statistically significant differences could be observed for Rome/Luxembourg and London/Luxembourg for both RCPs. Especially for Rome, the mean of the WSDI increased from 51 to 105 days (please note that the box plots show median values and not the arithmetic means).
